thread.section_title: Omni Financial Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omni Financial | www.omnitaxhelp.com
thread.title: James E Kendig
thread.title_full: Omni Financial reviewed by James E Kendig

author: James E Kendig
title: James E Kendig
text:
We are FREE from Tax Debt ! In2008the Insurance Co. I worked for went under & left the State, I had medical problems & over 80,000 in expenses
We lost our Home (short sale) & got behind in our Federal Taxes, for a couple years we paid 500 to 700 a month. Penalties & interests kept growing! It was bad, every day Praying for deliverance from this Debt !
We went to a tv add, J K Harris who robbed us over 4,000 would NOT answer calls & hid after 7 or 8 months I found him & he said, I make too much money ! I was on social security ! I told him He knew that when I filled info about my income! Another co in Calif. good rating worked with us over 2 years & charged me around 5,300 without any success !
We prayed for a miracle & my wife got a call on her cell phone from OMNI we tried 1 more time, we owed 77,000 in interest & penalties
Richard Monsolve said he would help & explained the offer & Comperise,He was always there & explained everything & comforted us
inabout one year I got a letter from IRS, they approved our offer for 100 dollars to settle the 77,000 Lein ! HALLELUJHA ! Thank You, & GOD BLESS YOU ! OMNI & Richard
